name: Model Author
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify an author

inputs.description: The optional author to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Author

inputs.description: Whether the author should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The name of the author.
inputs.name: Name

inputs.description: The email of the author.
inputs.name: Email

outputs.description: The constructed or modified author.
outputs.name: Author

outputs.description: True if the author is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: The name of the author.
outputs.name: Name

outputs.description: The email of the author.
outputs.name: Email

name: Model Connection
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a connection

inputs.description: The optional connection to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Connection

inputs.description: Whether the connection should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: Id of the connected piece.
inputs.name: Connected Piece Id

inputs.description: Optional id of the port of type of the piece. Otherwise the default port will be selected.
inputs.name: Connected Piece Type Port Id

inputs.description: Id of the connected piece.
inputs.name: Connecting Piece Id

inputs.description: Optional id of the port of type of the piece. Otherwise the default port will be selected.
inputs.name: Connecting Piece Type Port Id

inputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the connection.
inputs.name: Description

inputs.description: The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.
inputs.name: Gap

inputs.description: The optional lateral shift (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.
inputs.name: Shift

inputs.description: The optional vertical raise in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece. Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.
inputs.name: Raise

inputs.description: The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
inputs.name: Rotation

inputs.description: The optional turn perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.  Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.
inputs.name: Turn

inputs.description: The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
inputs.name: Tilt

inputs.description: The optional offset in x direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
inputs.name: X

inputs.description: The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
inputs.name: Y

inputs.description: The optional qualities of the connection.
inputs.name: Qualities

outputs.description: The constructed or modified connection.
outputs.name: Connection

outputs.description: True if the connection is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: Id of the connected piece.
outputs.name: Connected Piece Id

outputs.description: Optional id of the port of type of the piece. Otherwise the default port will be selected.
outputs.name: Connected Piece Type Port Id

outputs.description: Id of the connected piece.
outputs.name: Connecting Piece Id

outputs.description: Optional id of the port of type of the piece. Otherwise the default port will be selected.
outputs.name: Connecting Piece Type Port Id

outputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the connection.
outputs.name: Description

outputs.description: The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.
outputs.name: Gap

outputs.description: The optional lateral shift (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.
outputs.name: Shift

outputs.description: The optional vertical raise in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece. Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.
outputs.name: Raise

outputs.description: The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
outputs.name: Rotation

outputs.description: The optional turn perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.  Set this only when necessary as it is not a symmetric property which means that when the parent piece and child piece are flipped it yields a different result.
outputs.name: Turn

outputs.description: The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation and the turn) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.
outputs.name: Tilt

outputs.description: The optional offset in x direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
outputs.name: X

outputs.description: The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
outputs.name: Y

outputs.description: The optional qualities of the connection.
outputs.name: Qualities

name: Model Design
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a design

inputs.description: The optional design to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Design

inputs.description: Whether the design should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The name of the design.
inputs.name: Name

inputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the design.
inputs.name: Description

inputs.description: The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
inputs.name: Icon

inputs.description: The optional url to the image of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
inputs.name: Image

inputs.description: The optional variant of the design. No variant means the default variant.
inputs.name: Variant

inputs.description: The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.
inputs.name: View

inputs.description: The optional location of the design.
inputs.name: Location

inputs.description: The length unit for all distance-related information of the design.
inputs.name: Unit

inputs.description: The optional pieces of the design.
inputs.name: Pieces

inputs.description: The optional connections of the design.
inputs.name: Connections

inputs.description: The optional authors of the design.
inputs.name: Authors

inputs.description: The optional qualities of the design.
inputs.name: Qualities

outputs.description: The constructed or modified design.
outputs.name: Design

outputs.description: True if the design is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: The name of the design.
outputs.name: Name

outputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the design.
outputs.name: Description

outputs.description: The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
outputs.name: Icon

outputs.description: The optional url to the image of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
outputs.name: Image

outputs.description: The optional variant of the design. No variant means the default variant.
outputs.name: Variant

outputs.description: The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.
outputs.name: View

outputs.description: The optional location of the design.
outputs.name: Location

outputs.description: The length unit for all distance-related information of the design.
outputs.name: Unit

outputs.description: The optional pieces of the design.
outputs.name: Pieces

outputs.description: The optional connections of the design.
outputs.name: Connections

outputs.description: The optional authors of the design.
outputs.name: Authors

outputs.description: The optional qualities of the design.
outputs.name: Qualities

name: Model DiagramPoint
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a diagrampoint

inputs.description: The optional diagrampoint to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: DiagramPoint

inputs.description: Whether the diagrampoint should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The x-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
inputs.name: X

inputs.description: The y-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
inputs.name: Y

outputs.description: The constructed or modified diagrampoint.
outputs.name: DiagramPoint

outputs.description: True if the diagrampoint is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: The x-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
outputs.name: X

outputs.description: The y-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.
outputs.name: Y

name: Model Kit
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a kit

inputs.description: The optional kit to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Kit

inputs.description: Whether the kit should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The name of the kit.
inputs.name: Name

inputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the kit.
inputs.name: Description

inputs.description: The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
inputs.name: Icon

inputs.description: The optional url to the image of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
inputs.name: Image

inputs.description: The optional url of the preview image of the kit. The url must point to a landscape image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a 2x1 rectangle. The image must be at least 1920x960 pixels and smaller than 15 MB.
inputs.name: Preview

inputs.description: The optional version of the kit. No version means the latest version.
inputs.name: Version

inputs.description: The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) where to fetch the kit remotely.
inputs.name: Remote

inputs.description: The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) of the homepage of the kit.
inputs.name: Homepage

inputs.description: The optional license [ spdx id | url ] of the kit.
inputs.name: License

inputs.description: The optional types of the kit.
inputs.name: Types

inputs.description: The optional designs of the kit.
inputs.name: Designs

inputs.description: The optional qualities of the kit.
inputs.name: Qualities

outputs.description: The constructed or modified kit.
outputs.name: Kit

outputs.description: True if the kit is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: The name of the kit.
outputs.name: Name

outputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the kit.
outputs.name: Description

outputs.description: The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
outputs.name: Icon

outputs.description: The optional url to the image of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
outputs.name: Image

outputs.description: The optional url of the preview image of the kit. The url must point to a landscape image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a 2x1 rectangle. The image must be at least 1920x960 pixels and smaller than 15 MB.
outputs.name: Preview

outputs.description: The optional version of the kit. No version means the latest version.
outputs.name: Version

outputs.description: The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) where to fetch the kit remotely.
outputs.name: Remote

outputs.description: The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) of the homepage of the kit.
outputs.name: Homepage

outputs.description: The optional license [ spdx id | url ] of the kit.
outputs.name: License

outputs.description: The optional types of the kit.
outputs.name: Types

outputs.name: Designs

outputs.name: Qualities

name: Model Piece
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a piece

inputs.description: The optional piece to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Piece

inputs.description: Whether the piece should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: Id of the piece.
inputs.name: Id

inputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the piece.
inputs.name: Description

inputs.description: Name of the type of the piece.
inputs.name: Type Name

inputs.description: The optional variant of the type of the piece. No variant means the default variant.
inputs.name: Type Variant

inputs.description: The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.
inputs.name: Plane

inputs.description: The optional center of the piece in the diagram. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a center.
inputs.name: Center

inputs.description: Whether the piece is hidden. A hidden piece is not visible in the model.
inputs.name: Hidden

inputs.description: Whether the piece is locked. A locked piece cannot be edited.
inputs.name: Locked

inputs.description: The optional qualities of the piece.
inputs.name: Qualities

outputs.description: The constructed or modified piece.
outputs.name: Piece

outputs.description: True if the piece is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: Id of the piece.
outputs.name: Id

outputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the piece.
outputs.name: Description

outputs.description: Name of the type of the piece.
outputs.name: Type Name

outputs.description: The optional variant of the type of the piece. No variant means the default variant.
outputs.name: Type Variant

outputs.description: The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.
outputs.name: Plane

outputs.description: The optional center of the piece in the diagram. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a center.
outputs.name: Center

outputs.description: Whether the piece is hidden. A hidden piece is not visible in the model.
outputs.name: Hidden

outputs.description: Whether the piece is locked. A locked piece cannot be edited.
outputs.name: Locked

outputs.description: The optional qualities of the piece.
outputs.name: Qualities

name: Model Port
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a port

inputs.description: The optional port to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Port

inputs.description: Whether the port should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The optional local identifier of the port within the type. No id means the default port.
inputs.name: Id

inputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the port.
inputs.name: Description

inputs.description: Whether the port is mandatory. A mandatory port must be connected in a design.
inputs.name: Mandatory

inputs.description: The optional family of the port. This allows to define explicit compatibility with other ports.
inputs.name: Family

inputs.description: The optional other compatible families of the port. An empty list means this port is compatible with all other ports.
inputs.name: CompatibleFamilies

inputs.description: The connection point of the port that is attracted to another connection point.
inputs.name: Point

inputs.description: The direction of the port. When another piece connects the direction of the other port is flipped and then the pieces are aligned.
inputs.name: Direction

inputs.description: The parameter t [0,1[ where the port will be shown on the ring of a piece in the diagram. It starts at 12 o`clock and turns clockwise.
inputs.name: T

inputs.description: The optional qualities of the port.
inputs.name: Qualities

outputs.description: The constructed or modified port.
outputs.name: Port

outputs.description: True if the port is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: The optional local identifier of the port within the type. No id means the default port.
outputs.name: Id

outputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the port.
outputs.name: Description

outputs.description: Whether the port is mandatory. A mandatory port must be connected in a design.
outputs.name: Mandatory

outputs.description: The optional family of the port. This allows to define explicit compatibility with other ports.
outputs.name: Family

outputs.description: The optional other compatible families of the port. An empty list means this port is compatible with all other ports.
outputs.name: CompatibleFamilies

outputs.description: The connection point of the port that is attracted to another connection point.
outputs.name: Point

outputs.description: The direction of the port. When another piece connects the direction of the other port is flipped and then the pieces are aligned.
outputs.name: Direction

outputs.description: The parameter t [0,1[ where the port will be shown on the ring of a piece in the diagram. It starts at 12 o`clock and turns clockwise.
outputs.name: T

outputs.description: The optional qualities of the port.
outputs.name: Qualities

name: Model Quality
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a quality

inputs.description: Whether the quality should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The name of the quality.
inputs.name: Name

inputs.description: The optional value [ text | url ] of the quality. No value is equivalent to true for the name.
inputs.name: Value

inputs.description: The optional unit of the value of the quality.
inputs.name: Unit

inputs.description: The optional definition [ text | uri ] of the quality.
inputs.name: Definition

outputs.description: The constructed or modified quality.
outputs.name: Quality

outputs.description: True if the quality is valid. Null if no validation was performed.
outputs.name: Valid

outputs.description: The name of the quality.
outputs.name: Name

outputs.description: The optional value [ text | url ] of the quality. No value is equivalent to true for the name.
outputs.name: Value

outputs.description: The optional unit of the value of the quality.
outputs.name: Unit

outputs.description: The optional definition [ text | uri ] of the quality.
outputs.name: Definition

name: Model Type
description: Construct, deconstruct or modify a type

inputs.description: The optional type to deconstruct or modify.
inputs.name: Type

inputs.description: Whether the type should be validated.
inputs.name: Validate

inputs.description: The name of the type.
inputs.name: Name

inputs.description: The optional human-readable description of the type.
inputs.name: Description

inputs.description: The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the type. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.
inputs.name: Icon

inputs.description: The optional url to the image of the type. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.
inputs.name: Image

inputs.description: The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.
inputs.name: Variant

inputs.description: The optional number of items in stock. 2147483647 (=2^31-1) means infinite stock.
inputs.name: Stock

inputs.description: Whether the type is virtual. A virtual type is not physically present but is used in conjunction with other virtual types to form a larger physical type.
inputs.name: Virtual

inputs.name: Location

inputs.description: The length unit of the point and the direction of the ports of the type.

outputs.name: Image

outputs.description: The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.
outputs.name: Variant

outputs.description: The optional number of items in stock. 2147483647 (=2^31-1) means infinite stock.
outputs.name: Stock

outputs.description: Whether the type is virtual. A virtual type is not physically present but is used in conjunction with other virtual types to form a larger physical type.
outputs.name: Virtual

outputs.description: The optional location of the type.
outputs.name: Location

outputs.description: The length unit of the point and the direction of the ports of the type.
